content.description: Climb easy terrain to a roof before traversing left in a thin crack and climb dirty rock to the top.
content.protection: Trad - finger sized pieces   Tree anchor or traverse left to the bolted anchor on Memory of Light
content.location: Between Memory of Light and Tying the Knot

content.description: Climb jugs up to the slabby ledge to reach the base of the crack. Climb out the small roof crack in the dihedral.
content.protection: Light rack to #3 or #4 Camalot. Old tat/rope anchor around tree on top is a pain to check.
content.location: Starts 5-10' right of Wedding Bells. Goes out the hand crack on the right side of the roof. Just down the hill and climber's left of So Black It's Purple.

content.description: Climb up and move right, then back left to the arete on crimps.  Make a long move to a jug and the climbing eases off after that.
content.location: Left side of the crag.  Obvious arete.

content.description: Underclings and big holds lead to the top
content.location: Between Tying the Knot and Fatty Down

content.description: Short, powerful, and dynamic. Pull the first roof, make a hard second clip on a thin crimp, move to an obvious pocket, and ascend steep head wall with big reaches and dynos to establish the upper slab.
content.protection: Four fixed draws to chain anchors.
content.location: To the right of Powdered Toast Man

content.description: Climb out the juggy roof and make a long lock off move to a jug.  Bust out to the thin crimp and move up to a horn.  Climbing eases off a bit after this, but maintains some steepness.  This route is rated 12b most places, maybe a little soft.

start by pulling onto a ledge where you can take a rest by standing with no hands. move left into the permadraws and up to the roof. be careful as some of the holds up under the roof are a bit sketchy and could possibly pop off the rock. move up through the roof past the crux and good jugs to finish.
content.location: on the face to the left of Dr. Stupid and powdered Toast man. pretty obvious permadraw on the left of the face that makes this an easy route to find

content.description: A reach move leads to easy terrain ending with slopers.
content.location: Between Guilty by Association and Wedding Bells

content.description: Overhanging start leads to vertical face above.  A little lichen never hurt anyone.
content.location: Right end of Ren & Stimpy Wall, to the right around the corner from Powdered Toast Man.

content.description: Alternate line from the start of Mouth Trap. Head straight up to anchors just left of a tree.

content.location: Between Log and Memory of Light

content.description: Easy dihedral with a few face holds. Gear is ok.
content.location: Dihedral between Happy Happy Joy Joy and Dr. Stupid.

content.description: Rightmost line at Ren and Stimpy that has a reachy undercling crux
content.location: Rightmost line at Ren and Stimpy

content.description: Climb through the left hand side of a small roof on slightly overhanging rock.
content.protection: Five bolts and a two bolt anchor.
content.location: Just to the left of Powdered Toast man. Right of a large dihedral.

content.description: Move up and left on big holds to the second bolt, then move up and right through powerful climbing and hard to clip 3rd and 4th bolts.  BIG MOVES defines this short route.
content.location: Just right of the Big Sleep.

content.description: Awkward short route with a brief crux pulling on steep rock just left of an arete.
content.location: Between Rubble Nipple Salesman and Log.

content.description: Short, bouldery, but good movement on good holds.  Start on jugs and move up and right to thinner holds.  After clipping the third bolt move back left to the arete and ride it to the top.
content.location: Short steep wall just left of Space Madness.  The left route of the two routes.

content.description: Shady area with a good concentration of harder routes.
